sentences.sContent: There’s water all over the bathroom floor.
Does anyone want a drink of water?
a glass of sparkling mineral water
All rooms have hot and cold running water.
sentences.sCn: 所有房间都有冷热自来水供应。

sentences.sContent: Pour boiling water over the rice and let it soak.
sentences.sCn: 在大米中倒入沸水浸泡。

sentences.sContent: a fresh water spring
When dealing with a burst pipe, always turn off the water first.
sentences.sCn: 处理破裂水管时，一定要先把水关掉。

sentences.sContent: contamination of the local water supply
Will you water my houseplants while I’m away?
sentences.sCn: 我不在时你能给我家里的盆栽浇浇水吗？

sentences.sContent: The garden needs watering daily.
...The word “yellow” refers to the muddy water of it...
...We purify the water we drink with the water filter designed for the astronauts to use in space...
...water is helpful for the prevention and treatment of skin diseases...
...Wuzhen is an ancient water town in Zhejiang province...
...the water system and lifestyle of Wuzhen has not experienced many changes...
...The water supply would stop; the streets might not be cleaned; schools would be closed...
...You only have water to serve your guests...
...This is mineral water from Tibet...
...This will keep water out of the tank and will be a reserve in case you get into trouble...
...The privacy issue has already landed Facebook in hot water in Washington...

synos.tran: 水；海水；雨水；海域，大片的水

phrases.pCn: 水系；供水系统（等于water supply）
n. 水位；水平面；水准仪
高潮，高水位；水位达到最高点的

words.tran: 水的；淡的；湿的；松软的；有雨意的
掺水的；洒有水的，洒了水的；有波纹的；加虚股的（面值增加而实值未按比例增加）
无水的；干的；不用水的，不需水的
浇水，供以水（water的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the clear liquid without colour, smell, or taste that falls as rain and that is used for drinking, washing etc
if you water plants or the ground they are growing in, you pour water on them
